Interactive Timeline on Gettysburg and Vicksburg








Interactive Timeline on Gettysburg and Vicksburg in 1863
                    Union Diplomacy


By Joshua BottsOffice of the Historian, U.S. Department of State

Released July 3, 2013






A dynamic timeline constructed from the events described in “Brilliant and
                    Important Victories”: Gettysburg and Vicksburg in 1863 Union Diplomacy.
